home.title: César Alberca
home.whoAmI1: Digital Nomad & Code Enthusiast from Spain with a love for life beyond the keyboard. Crafting innovative solutions at [Autentia](https://www.autentia.com/). As an [international speaker](https://www.cesalberca.com/talks), I share my tech adventures. Active in the [Codemotion](https://www.codemotion.com/) community as a committee member and [ambassador](https://community-en.codemotion.it/community/ambassador-program). Podcast host for [digital nomads](https://coliversclub.com/). Off-duty, I’m scaling walls, strategizing in board games, or learning new hobbies.
home.whoAmI2: I’m a self-learning, creative, enthusiast and passionate person. I have a mixed profile, divided between my love for programming, software architecture and _design_.

projects.title: Some project's I've built
projects.katasDescription: Multiple TypeScript Katas to practice TDD and testing.
projects.whoAmIDescription: Simple Who Am I game implemented using RxJs, React and Firebase.
projects.frontendReformsDescription: Code for the talk Frontend Reforms where we build a Wordle for frontend frameworks

about.title: About me
about.description:
I’m a self-learning, creative, enthusiast and passionate person. I have a mixed profile, divided between my love for programming, software architecture and design. I truly care about sharing knowledge with my peers, that being as a speaker in different technological events, as a teacher or throughout my social networks.

I believe that Software should be robust yet flexible, and the way to achieve it is to –regardless of the framework– create the right abstractions and apply architectural patterns. Testing is very important to me, the Software we build should be reliable in order to provide the maximum value.
